title: Sweet and simple lemon tart
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '115g butter, softened', '30g icing sugar', '125g plain flour, sifted', 'For the lemon filling', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, or more to taste', '2 teaspoons grated lemon zest', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons icing sugar']
